turns.content:
Jo 9:20 AM
Hi Jackline,

I'm glad to hear that you're interested in discussing Earth Day 2023! I'm generally available on weekdays between 9:00 AM and 5:00 PM EST. To make it easier for you, please feel free to select a date and time that works best for you using the link below, and a meeting will be scheduled on our calendars:

<https://bit.ly/Meet-With-ForTreesClub>

Looking forward to our conversation!

Best regards,
Jo

Hey Bob, I hope you're having a lovely time during the holiday season.

We've created a group for equatorial project leaders to share their projects and successes so that we can all do our best to reach the 2030 Sustainable Development Goals.

I wanted to send you some information via bob.skeens@kbrwadventure.com - would you mind?

I'd really value your feedback and support in making this group active and productive.

Maybe you could join the group and help us reverse the negative effects of climate change... here's the info:

What’s the best way to get some time on the calendar to discuss Earth Day 2023?

Best regards,
Jo
